serviceContent.title: Where Distribution Breaks
serviceContent.description: From scattered orders to stock mismatches and delayed collections — these everyday issues stall your sales, stretch your backend, and slow down your growth.

topImagecards.title: Orders are coming in, but everything's still manual.
topImagecards.description: Dealers send orders over WhatsApp, calls, or spreadsheets — and your team scrambles to piece it together. Nothing's trackable. Nothing's standardized.

topImagecards.title: Sales reps are promising stock we don't have.
topImagecards.description: Sales teams often commit based on guesswork — and when orders fall through, operations gets the blame.

topImagecards.title: We follow up for payments, but there's no system.
topImagecards.description: No one knows which dealer paid, who didn't, or what's overdue — until it becomes a cash flow crisis.

topImagecards.title: The backend team is constantly firefighting instead of scaling ops.
topImagecards.description: Orders, payments, and schemes are logged manually — twice if they're fixing someone else's mistake.

topImagecards.title: Manual errors in dealer schemes = money lost every month.
topImagecards.description: Dealer-specific schemes and rates change by the region. But without automation, something always slips through.

topImagecards.title: By the time a report shows it, the damage is already done.
topImagecards.description: No visibility across SKUs or regions in real time means you're always reacting — never preventing.

serviceContent.title: Smart Automation,
serviceContent.description: From raising invoices to capturing expenses and reconciling bank data, Effortless does the grunt work—so your team can move fast, stay lean, and stay fundraise-ready.

featuresBanner.title: Turn Dealer Orders Into Cash — Faster
featuresBanner.description: From order placement to collection, streamline your entire order-to-cash cycle. Get paid quicker, reduce delays, and unlock working capital for growth.
features: Dealers place orders directly via portal — no calls, no errors
Auto-generated invoices + payment links via WhatsApp
Track receivables by dealer, region, and credit limit
Faster cash = better rotation, stronger cash flow

featuresBanner.title: Control Pricing, Stock & Payments Without Manual Work
featuresBanner.description: Give every dealer the right price and visibility — without relying on Excel or follow-ups. Approve, track, and fulfill orders across SKUs and schemes automatically.
features: Real-time stock visibility across all branches and warehouses
Dealer-specific pricing and discount logic applied instantly
Auto-apply schemes and validate item codes
Sales, ops, and finance all see the same truth

featuresBanner.title: Know What's Happening — Across Every Territory
featuresBanner.description: Get full visibility across your distributor chain — by product, region, and dealer. No more guessing. Just data-backed decisions that help you grow faster.
features: Live dashboards for orders, receivables, inventory, and collections
Drill down by distributor, sales rep, product, or zone
View pending orders, out-of-stock items, and overdue invoices instantly
Always investor- and audit-ready — no end-of-month scramble

serviceContent.title: What You Unlock
serviceContent.description: You didn't start your company to chase payments, fight spreadsheets, or stress about GST filings. Effortless gives you the control, speed, and freedom to focus on growth. Here's what startups across India are already unlocking:

useCaseSection.title: Let Dealers Order Themselves — and Get It Right the First Time
solution: Dealers place their own orders — no calls, no confusion.
Stock and pricing are always accurate and up to date.
Reps track order status in real time — not in Excel.

useCaseSection.title: Live Stock = No Guessing, No Apologies, No Lost Orders
solution: Live inventory across branches, godowns, and sales teams — all in sync.
What's shown to dealers is exactly what's available — no false promises.
Reps commit confidently. Ops delivers without chaos.

useCaseSection.title: Know Who Owes You — and Get Paid Without Chasing
solution: You know exactly who owes what — and how long it's been overdue.
Follow-ups run automatically via WhatsApp & email.
Payments get collected and reconciled — without anyone chasing.

useCaseSection.title: Operations That Run Themselves — So You Can Focus on Growth
solution: Orders, payments, and pricing are synced to Tally in real time.
GST and TDS stay clean, filed, and ready for audits.
No more gaps, double entries, or manual clean-up before month-end.

testimonials.name: S. Swaminathan
testimonials.review: Managing the entire business through an app is incredibly convenient and efficient. While the initial setup took some time—especially for tasks like setting up business accounts and integrating with GST portals—it was made much easier with the support of a skilled accountant who ensured everything was done smoothly and accurately.

testimonials.name: S.Saravanan Sundaramoothy
testimonials.review: As a startup founder, Effortless has greatly simplified managing our finances. The invoicing and collection features have optimized our cash flow, while the team ensures we stay fully compliant with GST and TDS, letting us focus on scaling the business.

testimonials.name: Hari Shankar
testimonials.review: Effortless is a true, unified solution for business finance. With a strong product and a strong team, Effortless really gives me the experience I was looking for when I was using other tools and services. Effortless helps me worry less about finance and compliance and gives me more time to focus on building the company.
